title: I Have No Health - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manhwa   Aristocracy   Beautiful Female Lead   Cold Love Interests   Complex Family Relationships   Couple Growth   Cute Protagonist   Demi-Humans   Doting Parents   European Ambience   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Mob Protagonist   Nobles   Reincarnation   Sickly Characters   Single Parent   Wealthy Characters
author: 이하론
description:
I possessed the body of the weakest supporting character who would die this winter.

Meals! Medicines! Exercise!

I started a war with my own body to survive against the evil spirit, also known as my grandfather, who threatened to kill me!

At that time, a handsome man showed up at my home, and he even saved me but –

He built an iron wall around him, saying he doesn’t like people and he didn’t like their touch, but this man’s behaviour towards me keeps on getting weird.

“What’s wrong with you these days? Get away from me.”

“I have Separation Anxiety.”

“..You don’t look anxious at all.”

No, didn’t you say you despise physical contact?

Ninena, a woman with poor health and Caesar, a man with no reason to live.

A cute healing romance starts at their encounter as they start to complete each other.

Writer Lee Ha-ron’s long romance fantasy novel of ‘I Have No Health’.>
